about_the_game:
A story from the creators of "Ego In A Coma" that depicts emancipation from the anguish of various emotions and cruelty environments.

Set in a night city, a woman who has been imprisoned and severely abused receives her powers from a mysterious black shadow. Released from her confinement room, she only desires destruction with only her feelings of revenge in his heart.
Through her battles and interactions with her collaborators, will she be able to learn what she should become in order to truly overcome from her suffering ?

Focused on brutal action, Moksha draws players into the world with over 40 weapons, not to mention fists.

Intense Combat
Enemies are aggressively coming at the protagonist. Wipe out the enemies in the room and move on.
Punch, kick, evade, and parry to fight flexibly and find out what lies ahead in the battle.

Various Weapons
Use scissors, pans, deck brushes, and anything else you can find around you to master powerful melee combat.
You can also use firepower weapons such as magnums, assault rifles, and shotguns.
Take advantage of your environment to lay waste to your enemies and take revenge.

Strengthen yourself by collecting shards
By collecting shards that appear after defeating enemies, players can buy weapons and reinforced items from merchants and level up at checkpoints.
It is up to the player to decide how to strengthen the main character.

Changing Clothing
Customize your appearance to match the environment and proceed in battle in your preferred attire.
Clothing can be found in various locations, and can be picked up to release them.

A diverse world unfolds
A variety of people live in the city at night. Nightclubs, yakuza offices, adult video stores, and other places are the setting for battles.
Underground, an unreal and unimaginable world unfolds.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
